meanings.definition: Separate recordings of individual tracks or instruments that can be mixed together to create a final audio product.
meanings.sent1: The studio had a collection of multitracks for the new album.
meanings.sent2: The engineer imported the multitracks into the editing software.
meanings.sent3: The multitracks decided to have a party and mix themselves up for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a box of multitracks, each memory a separate recording waiting to be played.
meanings.sent5: The multitracks were like puzzle pieces, fitting together to form a beautiful song.

meanings.definition: The individual tracks or recordings that make up a multitrack recording.
meanings.sent1: He carefully labeled each multitrack to keep them organized.
meanings.sent2: The multitracks were all in sync, creating a harmonious blend of sound.
meanings.sent3: The multitracks whispered secrets to each other in the studio.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like multitracks, each one playing a different tune in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The multitracks danced together, creating a symphony of music in the air.
